title: (x) "Some" serif italic and numbers - Adobe Caslon {Patricia}
content:
Hi, can anyone ID the Cap “S” and also #s on the right side of the image? Are they garamond? Please correct me if I’m wrong! Thank you!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [serif\_italic.JPG](http://web.archive.org/web/20070403073626/http:/typophile.com/files/serif_italic_0.JPG) | 278.75 KB |
author: typopo_80

comments.content: Looks like Caslon Italic (Adobe probably) plus swash. The numbers look like Adobe Caslon osf.
